author: lgo
msg: Add a --help option to win-tests.py that prints usage and exits
(_usage_exit): new function, called when -h or --help is specified.
Prints all options and then exits

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow checked-out versions of APR, APR-util, APR-iconv to work by letting
Visual Studio do the conversion for us instead of producing corrupt solutions
(get_external_project): Override with fallback logic to dsp's if we don't
have a vcproj file already so we don't produce corrupt solutions.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add zlib as a dependency for serf.
(adjust_win_depends): Add zlib as a build dependency for serf too.

author: lgo
msg: * win-tests.py: List -c (--cleanup) option in the usage comment.
